title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Learning Behavior Change Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient diagnosis simulations (history-taking/physical exams) for two or more hours per week in flipped learning settings.
Learners maintain over 80% participation in discussion-based classes based on pre-learning via lecture videos.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate their learning time allocation (video viewing/textbook reading/practice) using digital learning analytics tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
